description: AMD GPU Metrics based on the rocm-rdc prometheus plugin and fluent-bit metrics from github.com/ROCm/rdc

panels.description: The official product name of the AMD GPU series. This is an alphanumeric string.
panels.title: Name

panels.description: The current performance state for the GPU. States range from P0 (maximum performance) to P12 (minimum performance).
panels.title: P-State

panels.description: Percent of average current GPUs usage across all the nodes to indicate how busy the respective blocks are. For --showuse (gpu_busy_percent sysfs file), the SMU samples every ms or so to see if any GPU block (RLC, MEC, PFP, CP) is busy.
panels.title: GPU Utilization

panels.description: Show current Average Graphics Package Power Consumption with --showpower. "Graphics Package" refers to the GPU plus any HBM (High-Bandwidth memory) modules, if present.
panels.title: Power Draw

panels.description: Show average GPU temperature using --showtemp in degrees Celsius. Temperature (Sensor junction) (C) often referred to as the "Tjunction" measures the highest operational temperature and is critical for understanding thermal throttling conditions.
panels.title: GPU Temperature

panels.description: Show average Memory temperature using --showtemp in degrees Celsius. Temperature (Sensor memory) (C) measures the temperature of the GPU’s memory (VRAM)
panels.title: Memory Temparature

panels.description: Assesses the health of active GPU nodes, highlighting any discrepancies such as offline or drained nodes
panels.title: Node Health

panels.description: The kernel driver version of the installed AMD display driver. This is an alphanumeric string.
panels.title: Driver Version

panels.description: The BIOS of the GPU board.
panels.title: Vbios Version

panels.description:
Average PCIe bandwidth or transfer rate using  amd-smi metric --pcie in gigabytes/sec. amd-smi reports  instantaneous, bidirectional bandwidth, measured in small intervals.

Scale-out network bandwidth 8 PCIe® Gen 5 x16 (128 GB/s) per GPU.

"8 PCIe® Gen 5 or Gen4 x16 (128 GB/s) per GPU" indicates that each AMD GPU can support up to 8 PCIe Gen 5 or Gen 4 slots, with each slot having 16 lanes total data transfer bandwidth per GPU. PCIe Gen 5 x16 can achieve up to 16 GB/s of data transfer per direction (32 GB/s bidirectional). With 8 such connections, the total bandwidth is 8 x 16 GB/s = 128 GB/s.

Information about factors that are reducing the frequency of clocks. If all throttle reasons are returned as "Not Active" it means that clocks are running as high as possible.

defaults.noValue: Throttle Reasons - Not Active .... Metrics not supported

panels.title: PCI Express Bandwidth

panels.description: Average frequency of GPU graphics (shader) clock using  --showgpuclocks in hertz
panels.title: GPU Clock Speed

panels.description: Average frequency of memory clock using --showclocks in hertz
panels.title: Memory Clock Speed

panels.description: Total memory allocated by active contexts / Total installed memory of the GPU instance.
panels.title: Memory Allocation

panels.description: Show current GPU memory used in percentage with --showmemuse. For detailed memory usage information for given block(s) TYPEs (vram, vis_vram, gtt) use --showmeminfo will show the amount of VRAM used as well as the total available for those partitions
panels.title: Memory Utilization

panels.description: Total memory allocated by active contexts.
panels.title: Memory Allocation

panels.description: Core GPU (Sensor junction) temperature in degree C.
panels.title: GPU Temperature

panels.description: Last measured power draw for the entire board, in watts. Only available if power management is supported. This reading is accurate to within +/- 5 watts
panels.title: Power Draw

panels.description: GPU’s memory VRAM (Sensor memory) temperature in degree C
panels.title: Memory Temparature

panels.description:
Current GPUs usage across all the nodes.
The sample period may be between 1 second and 1/6 second depending on the product.
panels.title: GPU Utilization

panels.description: Current frequency of graphics (shader) clock.
panels.title: Graphics Clock Speed

panels.description: Current frequency of memory clock.
panels.title: Memory Clock Speed

panels.description: Show PCIe Tx and Rx (PCI Express Transmit and Receive) utilization with --showbw
panels.title: PCI Express Transmit and Receive

panels.description: Show current GPU memory used by active contexts
panels.title: Memory Utilization

title: AMD GPU Node Metrics Overview
